title: The MOST Damaging Effect of Tillage

tasks.task: Understanding the impact of tillage on soil health and water infiltration
subtasks: Recognizing the benefits of maintaining organic matter in soil
Acknowledging the negative effects of tillage on soil structure
Understanding the role of tillage in degrading organic matter
Calculating water infiltration rates with different organic matter levels
Appreciating the significance of even small increases in organic matter for water retention
Comparing current soil conditions to those of grandpa's time in terms of organic matter

tasks.task: Implementing soil conservation practices to improve water infiltration and organic matter
subtasks: Reducing or eliminating tillage to preserve soil structure
Incorporating organic matter into the soil through natural means or composting
Monitoring soil moisture levels and adjusting practices for optimal water retention
Regularly assessing soil health and organic matter content and making adjustments as needed
